title: So You Want to be an IT Consultant?
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green gives advice to people who are considering becoming IT Consultants.

title: My Interview with ThoughtWorks
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about his interview with ThoughtWorks and provides simple advice for candidates.

title: Tips on how to survive IT projects you don't like
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about how to survive projects you don't like.

title: Those Pesky Soft Skills!  Who Needs Them? Part 1
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about the importance of soft skills such as timesheets, expenses and resume management.

title: Lessons I learned after being laid off for the first time
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about how being laid off for the first time provided very valuable life experiences.

title: Those Pesky Soft Skills!  Who Needs Them? Part 2
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about the importance of soft skills such as being professional, taking ownership and communication.

title: What are the Pros and Cons of Agile Scrum? Part 1
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green shares his thoughts on the pros and cons of agile scrum.

title: Those Pesky Soft Skills!  Who Needs Them? Part 3
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about the importance of soft skills such as sales and recruiting.

title: What are the Pros and Cons of Agile Scrum? Part 2
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green shares his thoughts on the pros and cons of agile scrum.

title: A Conversation About Majority Privilege
author: Michael D. Green
snippet: Michael D. Green talks about the concept of Majority Privilege. How it works, how it doesn't work, who benefits from it and its consequences.
